name: Become A Warrior
description:
Become A Warrior is a free platformer action game.

There it is!! Become A Warrior.

Hello, it is the first game we have presented to you as the BT Team. You can reach the youtube address of the BT Team by clicking the link in the description.

 Enjoy :D

Controls :

A or  Left Arrow Key = Walk Left 

D or Right Arrow Key = Walk Right

Space = Jump

Left Click = Attack

BT Games Team :

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLlx5PhK6rKzVVTFc8fqiZQ
